pages.text: A misting who can only burn $(thing)duralumin$() is known as a $(br)"$(thing)Duralumin Gnat$()" as they gain no discernible effect from burning their metal. The metal reserves of a misting burning duralumin will deplete faster, but will have a much more prominent effect. You might note that this feature is useless on its own, as it needs to be used in tandom with a second metal.
Duralumin is the internal pushing metal and one of four enhancement metals (alongside Aluminum, Chromium, and Nicrosil
